meanings.definition: The quality or state of being seasonal.
meanings.sent1: The colorful leaves changing in autumn showcase the beautiful seasonalities of nature.
meanings.sent2: I love how the different flowers bloom at various times, highlighting the seasonalities of the garden.
meanings.sent3: The pumpkin spice latte craze is a fun example of seasonalities in the beverage industry.
meanings.sent4: Her wardrobe reflects the seasonalities of fashion trends, always adapting to the latest styles.
meanings.sent5: The migration patterns of birds demonstrate the fascinating seasonalities of animal behavior.

meanings.definition: The characteristic of occurring or changing with the seasons.
meanings.sent1: Farmers rely on the seasonalities of weather to plan their planting schedules.
meanings.sent2: The local market offers fresh produce based on the seasonalities of the region.
meanings.sent3: The holiday decorations in stores change according to the seasonalities of the year.
meanings.sent4: The landscape transforms with the seasonalities of snowfall, creating a winter wonderland.
meanings.sent5: Her mood shifts with the seasonalities of sunlight, feeling more energized in the summer.
